Module 3: Pipeline integration (SRE) 
===============================================================
Expected time to complete: **20 minutes**

**Intro**

`Gitlab <https://about.gitlab.com/>`_ is a CI/CD and code repository platform. 

**In this lab, we will cover the following:**

- Overview of the existing pipeline (without security) 
- Adding AWAF protection to the application 
- Failing and resolving the failure in a testing environment 


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   lab*
   review
